items.name: NRX
items.description: NRX (netreplica exporter) is a network topology exporter that reads network topology graphs from NetBox DCIM system and exports them to various formats including Containerlab, Cisco Modeling Labs, network visualization formats, and custom formats via Jinja2 templates.

summary.business_use_case: Accelerates lab creation and testing by automatically generating lab topologies from existing network documentation, reducing manual effort and errors in test environment setup
summary.integration: NetBox, Containerlab, Cisco Modeling Labs, Nvidia Air, Graphite, D2, Cytoscape
summary.release_rate: Regular releases with new features and format support
summary.use_case: Export network topologies from NetBox to lab automation tools like Containerlab and CML, create network visualizations, and bridge the gap between network documentation and lab automation
